        private void startGame()
        This method starts the game. It can only be started from the ServerModel itself as it is marked private!

      • handoutCards

        public boolean handoutCards(java.util.List<Card> cardsToHandOut)
        This method shuffles the card set and assigns each player 7 cards
        Parameters:
        cardsToHandOut -
        Returns:
        void (updates the Player object)

      • loadGameCards

        private void loadGameCards()
        This method initially loads all the effectiv required cards into the active cards array Performs a consistency check and fails of masterdata contains inconsistent data index0: Age 1 index1: Age 2 index2: Age 3

      • getBoard

        public Board getBoard(int i)

      • evaluateWinner

        public java.util.List<Player> evaluateWinner(java.util.List<Player> players)
        This method evaluates the winner with the given game rules.
        Parameters:
        n - amount of players. Normally these players will be a KeySet of the Map which are active in this game session
        Returns:
        a list of players sorted by winning points. Winner is in index 0 and looser in last index.

      • dealMilitaryPoints

        public void dealMilitaryPoints(Player p)
        Method for comparing all the military strength and deal military points
        Parameters:
        p -

      • passCardsToNextPlayer

        public void passCardsToNextPlayer(CardAge age)
        This method passes the cards from one player to the other. Direction is defined within the CardAge. Precondition: Left and Right player for each player must be set! Active players are taken from the Player Map.
